message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I know it would be valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me at $10,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but I think that's the highest I can go. Can you consider that?
